pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.earlyProgramDesc: We are selecting the first 100 users for the Early Program. Get free access to all Premium features during the beta phase.

dataSecurity.question: Is it safe to connect my financial data?
dataSecurity.answer: We never ask for direct access to your broker. All data is imported via CSV files that you manually upload. Your data is encrypted and stored on secure servers in Europe, fully compliant with GDPR.

brokerImport.question: Can I import transactions from other brokers?
brokerImport.answer: Yes, we support importing from many brokers via CSV files. We currently have optimized templates for Moneyfarm, Degiro, Scalable Capital, Directa, and many others. If your broker is not on the list, you can still import data using our generic CSV format.

pricing.question: How much does it cost?
pricing.answer: We are currently selecting the first 100 users for the Early Program with free access to all Premium features. After the beta period, we will have three plans: Free (€0/month), Standard (€5.99/month), and Premium (€9.99/month). Early adopters will maintain free access to the platform forever.
